courseDetails.title: MySQL pour les débutants: Formation MySQL de A à Z
courseDetails.shortDescription: Comprendre SQL à l'aide de la base de données MySQL. Apprendre la conception de bases de données et l'analyse de données
courseDetails.longDescription:
MySQL est un systême très rapide et compact, vous pouvez donc l'exécuter avec vos autres applications sur un ordinateur portable ou de bureau. Dans ce cours, vous serez guidé à travers les bases de SQL et introduit à aux bases de données MySQL, et à la fin du cours, vous aurez une réelle capacité à créer et à superviser vos bases de données.

Ce cours vous montrera en outre comment installer le logiciel MySQL et effectuer la configuration de base. Vous apprendrez également les requêtes de base en SQL et MySQL.

Au long de ce cours, vous comprendrez que savoir comment fonctionnent les bases de données est un avantage considérable dans n’importe quel cheminement de carrière que vous avez choisi; que vous soyez intéressé par le marketing, la gestion de compte, la programmation ou la recherche et d'autres innombrables domaines d'études.

Votre capacité à tirer parti d'une base de données à votre avantage est un outil incroyablement puissant à manier. Suivre ce cours vous rendra plus utile et pertinent pour les employeurs qui auront besoin de votre maîtrise de MySQL pour répondre à leurs besoins axés sur les données.

Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

Le cours vous aidera à assurer votre confiance dans la gestion de base de données MySQL en vous montrant comment optimiser les performances et les requêtes pour votre base de données. Ce cours améliorera vos compétences car il a une bonne applicabilité dans le monde de la technologie, ce qui peut différencier votre travail de la concurrence.

Les progrès rapides dans le monde de la technologie peuvent également être decourageant pour quiconque souhaitant entrer dans le domaine de la technologie des bases de données, mais ce cours, vous fournissant instructions et explications étape par étape, sera un garde et une lumière au bout du tunnel pour vous.

Apprenez en plus sur la façon d'ajouter des fonctionnalités et des commandes à l'environnement MySQL pour créer une meilleure cohérence des données et une sécurité suffisante pour répondre à toutes les responsabilités de tout gestionnaire de données.

Vous apprendrez également des techniques et des méthodes spécifiques qui peuvent être utilisées pour maintenir les bases de données, afin de les garder sécurisées, bien organisées et rapides.


Le MySQL ultime pour les débutants

L'acquisition de cette compétence vous rendra indispensable en cette ère de l'information car MySQL en tant que cours est un outil très utile à avoir. Il ne nécessite pas d'expertise technique ou d'expérience avant d'apprendre à utiliser MySQL car il est destiné aux débutants
targetAudiences: Ce cours s'adresse aux utilisateurs débutants et/ou expérimentés
Développeurs MySQL débutants, administrateurs de base de données et administrateur de sécurité

courseDetails.title: Excel VBA pour débutants: Formation pas à pas sur Excel VBA
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apprendre et Maitrisez Microsoft Excel VBA de A à Z !
courseDetails.longDescription:
VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. En tant que cours pour débutants, vous apprendrez les bases de la compréhension de VBA et de ce qu'il fait. Vous apprendrez comment enregistrer votre première macro, suivi d'un développement progressif dans l'apprentissage de tout le langage fondamental VBA menant à la création de votre propre module VBA.

A la fin du cours, vous aurez appris à créer vos formulaires d'utilisateur avec lesquels d'autres utilisateurs pourront interagir et saisir leurs données.

Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. VBA Excel permet de gagner du temps en terminant la même action sur plusieurs classeurs Excel, ce qui vous fait gagner beaucoup de temps grâce à une action automatisée.

Il est conçu pour les débutants : ce cours est un guide étape par étape pour une compréhension facile pour les personnes qui n'ont aucune connaissance de ce qu'est VBA mais qui ont des connaissances sur Excel.
targetAudiences: Ce programme VBA Excel est destiné aux débutants sans connaissances préalables sur VBA
Pour une expérience personnelle ou pour votre travail, ou votre entreprise, et pour tous ceux qui cherchent à ajouter une signification supplémentaire à leurs connaissances et compétences.

courseDetails.title: Tailwind CSS en 1h: Maîtriser ce puissant framework CSS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cours complet sur Tailwind CSS pour développer rapidement de superbes sites web
courseDetails.longDescription:
Vous en avez assez d'utiliser des outils de création de landing page professionnelle sans avoir à tout styliser vous-même ? Vous êtes au bon endroit ; ce cours sera un tutoriel complet sur Tailwind CSS.

Tailwind est un cadre de travail axé sur l'utilité qui transforme la conception de sites Web en un jeu d'enfant. Sa simplicité et son éventail de classes en font un excellent outil pour les développeurs débutants.

Ce cours vous aidera à créer une page web réactive parfaite pour votre application, votre entreprise, votre portfolio ou votre blog. Avoir une petite connaissance de HTML et CSS est idéal pour vous mettre sur la voie la plus rapide vers Tailwind ; cependant, ce n'est pas essentiel.

Le premier aspect de ce cours sera de se familiariser avec les utilitaires CSS de Tailwind et la façon dont ils fonctionnent et sont mis en œuvre. Nous aborderons le fameux système de grille et les requêtes média pour que votre nouvelle page soit la plus belle possible sur tous les appareils.

Nous vous présenterons les polices, les couleurs, l'alignement, les couleurs d'arrière-plan, les dégradés, les images, le padding, la marge, la grille, le flexbox, le hover, les animations, les transitions et la transformation.


Pourquoi choisir ce cours ?

Tutoriel complet sur Tailwind CSS : Vous serez guidé à travers chaque étape du code pour vous assurer que vous avez la bonne compréhension et les outils avant un professionnel après avoir suivi ce cours.

Tutoriel basé sur la pratique : Vous apprendrez par la pratique pour vous aider à comprendre plus rapidement tous les aspects du cadre CSS Tailwind. Vous aurez également accès aux outils qui vous permettront de remanier notre modèle ou de créer une toute nouvelle page d'accueil en fonction de vos besoins. Tout au long de la formation, vous pourrez télécharger des fichiers de projet, que vous pourrez conserver et retravailler à votre guise.

Exploitez votre créativité : En plus d'apprendre à créer une page d'accueil Tailwind CSS propre, moderne et professionnelle, vous apprendrez également à ajouter des animations et des polices de caractères Google pour que votre site Web se distingue des autres.


Apprenez à créer vos prochains sites Web professionnels dès aujourd'hui !

Avec le bon état d'esprit, la compréhension et l'application des enseignements de ce cours, vous commencerez instantanément à progresser vers la maîtrise de Tailwind CSS.

Une connaissance de base de CSS3 et HTML 5 est un plus !
targetAudiences: Toute personne qui souhaite apprendre Tailwind CSS
Les personnes qui en ont assez d'utiliser CSS3 et qui veulent utiliser quelque chose de plus simple
Les concepteurs de sites Web
Tous ceux qui veulent créer de beaux designs

courseDetails.title: Le cours complet de React.JS pour débutants
courseDetails.shortDescription: Créez des applications Web robustes, rapides, conviviales et réactives.
courseDetails.longDescription:
React.JS a joué un rôle fondamental pour faciliter la création d’interfaces utilisateur dynamiques ainsi que de sites web et applications à mesure que leur demande augmente. La majorité des développeurs front-end utilisant maintenant JavaScript pour créer leurs sites web et applications, il n’est pas étonnant que les librairies et framework associés connaissent également un essor. L’un des plus populaires est React, qui permet de créer des composants HTML uniques et des applications sophistiquées en un temps record.

Cependant, ces librairies et frameworks ne sont pas toujours simples d’utilisation, d’où la création de ce cours qui vous guidera pas à pas. Les notions les plus complexes seront décortiquées pour permettre au plus grand nombre de les maîtriser.

Ce cours est amusant, engageant et intéractif ; ce qui signifie que cela ne sera pas purement une approche théorique mais avant tout une mise en pratique concrète. Le contenu est rendu accessible par un instructeur intelligent et expérimenté. Des outils d'apprentissage essentiels tels que des questionnaires et des devoirs sont également inclus dans la leçon pour vous aider à mieux comprendre le sujet.


Qu’est-ce qui est couvert par ce cours ?

· Une vue d’ensemble de React et de ses idées fondamentales

· Découvrir ce qu'est JSX, comment celui-ci marche et quand utiliser des composants avec et sans état

· Travailler avec des fonctions et des composants de classe

· Importer et exporter des modules React

· Comprendre comment les méthodes de rendu fonctionnent en détail

· Le cycle de vie des composants React ainsi que leur multitude

· Utiliser des composants réutilisables pour créer des sites web dynamiques

· Créer une excellente structure d’exploitation pour un projet du début à la fin


Qu’attendez-vous ? Inscrivez-vous à ce cours aujourd’hui !

Ce cours vous poussera et vous mettra au défi de passer d'un novice complet à React à l'un des 10 % des meilleurs développeurs React.

Il s'agit sans aucun doute d'un cours en ligne complet sur React JS que vous ne trouverez nulle part ailleurs. Ce guide complet vous guidera à travers les sujets React JS fondamentaux, intermédiaires et avancés. Vous travaillerez également sur divers projets tout en acquérant toutes les compétences nécessaires pour devenir l'un des meilleurs développeurs React.

Vous n'avez besoin d'aucune connaissance préalable de React ou de tout autre framework JS pour commencer. Cependant, pour suivre ce cours, vous avez besoin d'une compréhension de base de HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
targetAudiences: Les développeurs web qui sont nouveaux dans ce milieu et qui veulent apprendre le framework React JS
Les développeurs qui ont une compréhension basique de JavaScript et qui veulent ajouter React JS à leur liste de compétences
Les développeurs web qui souhaitent apprendre React JS de A à Z et avancer dans leur carrière
Les professionnels qui sont déjà familiers avec les frameworks web tels que Angular ou Vue et souhaitent découvrir React JS
Les développeurs frontend qui veulent apprendrent React JS et ainsi modifier leur approche de travail

courseDetails.title: JavaScript pour les débutants : Cours complet pour débutants
courseDetails.shortDescription: Formation Complète Javascript: Le cours de A à Z pour maîtriser JavaScript
courseDetails.longDescription:
**Tout ce qu’il faut savoir sur JavaScript résumé dans un seul cours**

JavaScript est le langage de programmation le plus populaire du monde. Il fait tourner la quasi entièreté du web moderne et fournit des jobs très bien payés à travers le monde.

Que vous souhaitiez faire carrière dans le front ou le back-end, vous devez avoir une bonne compréhension de ce langage universel !

Vous êtes au bon endroit pour cela !


Pourquoi choisir ce cours ?

Ce cours est incontournable pour quatre raisons évidentes :

1) Cours complet sur JavaScript : il s'agit d'un package tout-en-un qui vous guidera depuis les bases mêmes de JavaScript jusqu'à la création d'applications modernes et complexes.

2) JavaScript moderne rendu facile : vous recevrez des conseils à travers des exemples de code pratiques et amusants, des théories critiques sur le fonctionnement de JavaScript dans les coulisses et des projets magnifiques et complets.

3) Pensez comme un développeur : vous apprendrez à planifier les fonctionnalités de l'application, à concevoir votre code, à déboguer le code et à de nombreuses autres compétences concrètes dont vous aurez besoin dans votre travail de développeur.

4) De débutant à expert : contrairement à d'autres cours, celui-ci contient des sujets pour débutants, intermédiaires, avancés et même experts, vous n'avez donc pas besoin d'acheter un autre cours pour maîtriser JavaScript à partir de zéro !


Que couvre exactement ce cours ?

Ce cours vous permettra de maîtriser parfaitement les fondamentaux de JavaScript : variables, if/else, opérateurs, logique booléenne, fonctions, tableaux, boucles, objets, strings et bien d’autres.


JavaScript est un très bon premier langage de programmation !

Aucune expérience dans le code n’est nécessaire pour s'inscrire à ce cours ! Même si vous êtes totalement novice dans le domaine de l‘informatique, ce cours vous fera passer de débutant à expert. Une connaissance basique d'HTML et de CSS est un plus mais n’est absolument pas obligatoire !

Tous les ordinateurs et systèmes d'exploitation marcheront – Windows, macOS ou Linux. Vous êtes le seul matériel nécessaire pour suivre ce cours.

À la fin de celui-ci, vous aurez les connaissances et la confiance requises pour survoler vos entretiens professionnels et devenir un développeur professionnel.

Commencez maintenant !
targetAudiences: N’importe qui voulant apprendre à coder avec Javascript
Développeurs web et designers
Propriétaires de sites web
N’importe qui voulant se replonger dans le JavaScript
N’importe qui voulant créer des sites web
N’importe qui voulant pratiquer le JavaSript
Ceux qui veulent apprendre JavaScript dans un seul et même endroit

courseDetails.title: Self-Care for Business Owners and Entrepreneurs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Self-Care Strategies for Thriving Business Owners and Entrepreneurs
courseDetails.longDescription:
Running a business or being an entrepreneur can be an exhilarating and rewarding journey, but it also comes with its unique set of challenges and stresses. Amidst the daily hustle and responsibility of driving success, self-care often gets neglected, leading to burnout, decreased productivity, and a compromised well-being.

This empowering course is specifically designed to equip business owners and entrepreneurs with essential self-care practices and techniques to foster a healthy work-life balance and achieve sustainable success. Participants will embark on a transformative learning experience, gaining insights, tools, and strategies to prioritize their physical, mental, and emotional well-being while effectively managing their professional ventures.

Course Overview: In this comprehensive course, we delve into the importance of self-care as a foundation for entrepreneurial growth and personal fulfillment. We explore the various facets of self-care, including stress management, time optimization, healthy habits, and mindful practices, tailored to the unique challenges faced by business owners and entrepreneurs.

Key Learning Objectives:

  1. Recognizing the Importance of Self-Care

  2. Stress Management and Resilience

  3. Creating Work-Life Balance

  4. Optimizing Time and Productivity

  5. Cultivating Mindfulness

  6. Nurturing Physical Health

  7. Building Support Systems

  8. Sustaining Long-Term Success


    With an emphasis on practical application, interactive exercises, and real-life case studies, participants will leave this course equipped with the tools and knowledge to create a thriving business while fostering a healthy, fulfilling, and balanced life. Embrace the journey of self-care as a catalyst for your success and well-being as a business owner or entrepreneur.
targetAudiences: Business owners and entrepreneurs

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Food & Beverage (F&B) Management 3.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Food and Beverge Management, F&B Management, F&B Manager, Restaurant Marketing,Banquet Management,Restaurant  Management
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Food & Beverage (F&B) Management 3.0

Welcome to the cutting-edge Master Course in Food & Beverage (F&B) Management 3.0! In this master course, we will explore the exciting new era of culinary education that is redefining the food and beverage industry. As technology, consumer preferences, and global trends continue to evolve, it is imperative for aspiring F&B professionals to equip themselves with the latest knowledge and skills. Let's delve into the highlights and benefits of this innovative master course that is poised to shape the future of F&B management.

The Food and Beverage Management course aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices involved in managing food and beverage operations in the hospitality industry. Through theoretical knowledge and practical applications, students will develop the necessary skills to excel in F&B management roles, such as restaurant manager, banquet manager, bar manager, or catering supervisor.

The Master Course in Food & Beverage (F&B) Management 3.0 is an exciting leap forward in culinary education. It prepares students to thrive in the fast-paced, technologically-driven, and sustainable F&B landscape of the future. By combining hands-on culinary training, tech-savvy skills, sustainability practices, and business acumen, this course sets the stage for aspiring F&B professionals to achieve culinary excellence and entrepreneurial success.

If you are passionate about food, dream of creating extraordinary culinary experiences, and aspire to lead the future of the F&B industry, the Master Course in F&B Management 3.0 awaits you! Embark on this transformative journey and make your mark in the world of food and beverage.

1. Understanding F&B Management 3.0

The F&B industry is constantly evolving, and the third iteration of this master course represents a revolutionary leap in the field. F&B Management 3.0 recognizes the importance of blending traditional culinary practices with modern technology and sustainable strategies. This comprehensive program offers students a dynamic learning experience that encompasses everything from culinary arts to business management, ensuring they are prepared to tackle the diverse challenges of the industry.

2. Immersive Culinary Education

One of the key components of F&B Management 3.0 is an immersive culinary education. Students will have the opportunity to work in state-of-the-art kitchens and restaurants, under the guidance of seasoned chefs and industry experts. Hands-on experience will enhance their technical skills and creativity, allowing them to create innovative and delectable dishes that cater to the ever-evolving palates of consumers.

3. Embracing Technology for Success

In the digital age, technology plays a significant role in every industry, and F&B is no exception. F&B Management 3.0 recognizes the transformative power of technology and how it can streamline processes, enhance customer experiences, and optimize business operations. Students will be exposed to cutting-edge kitchen equipment, POS systems, data analytics, and online marketing tools. Understanding and harnessing the potential of technology will give graduates a competitive advantage in the fast-paced F&B world.

4. Sustainable Practices

Sustainability is a defining factor in modern F&B management. From farm-to-table concepts to reducing food waste, the Master Course emphasizes sustainable practices. Students will learn how to source ethically, implement eco-friendly operations, and develop menus that celebrate local, seasonal produce. By aligning with the global sustainability movement, graduates will contribute positively to society and the environment.

5. Business Acumen and Entrepreneurship

Beyond the culinary aspects, F&B Management 3.0 equips students with essential business acumen. From financial management to marketing strategies, participants will develop a holistic understanding of F&B operations. This empowers graduates to become successful entrepreneurs or make strategic contributions to existing F&B establishments.

6. International Exposure

The F&B industry is diverse and multicultural. Recognizing this, the Master Course offers international exposure, allowing students to understand different cuisines, cultures, and consumer behaviors. Global networking opportunities and internships in renowned F&B establishments around the world will broaden students' horizons and enrich their learning experience.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:

1. Mastering the Art of Food and Beverage Management: Navigating Menu Planning, Design, and More

2. Excellence in Food and Beverage Service: Unlocking the Secrets of Operations and Beverage Management

3. Restaurant Success Blueprint: Marketing, Customer Service, and Ensuring Food Safety and Hygiene

4. Optimizing F&B Performance: Cost Control, Budgeting, Staff Training, and Effective Management

5. Unforgettable Events and Banquets: Embracing Technology in Modern F&B Management

6. Sustainability in F&B Operations: A Journey of Innovation, Case Studies, and Industry Insights
targetAudiences: All UG and PG Business, Hotel management, Travel and Tourism students, Hospitality management students
Interested students to learn about the concepts of Food & Beverage (F&B) Management

courseDetails.title: Importance of Power Quality in Power System
courseDetails.shortDescription: We're going to talk about causes of power quality, power quality issues and parameters in much detail
courseDetails.longDescription:
We're going to talk about the importance of power quality in the power systems, we're going to talk about the causes of power quality, uncertain events from the utility end, generation, transmission, and distribution as well as from the consumer and the manufacturer end, the common power quality issues and parameters such as on the transient side, the voltage variation side, the unbalanced voltages, the flickers, the distorted waveforms, the thing called total harmonic distortion and what that means as well as power factor and varying frequency.

We will also talk about the effects of poor power quality on the power system and the detrimental things that it causes to equipment and other types of devices. We're going to talk about the power quality standards, what are they, who are the organization that produces and where do you go for specific power quality standards that most utilities, consumers, manufacturers, most people kind of follow and defines the baseline of power quality all over the world. We're going to talk about power quality improvement techniques, you know something called power system studies which is AllumiaX offers and we really excel at as well as power conditioning devices, surge protectors, filters, voltage regulators, ups. We're going to talk about power quality monitoring in detail.

So, stick around you'll expect to learn a lot from this course. And I hope to see you on the other side.
targetAudiences: Electrical engineering students
Electrical Engineers
Instrument Engineers
Power system designers
Safety engineers

courseDetails.title: Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality & Teaching Delivery 3.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality, Teacher Training, Teaching Delivery, Pedagogy, Teaching Online, Adult Education
courseDetails.longDescription:
Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality & Teaching Delivery 3.0

This course aims to equip aspiring educators with the fundamental principles and practical strategies necessary to excel in teaching. Participants will explore various teaching methods, analyze factors that contribute to teaching quality, and develop effective teaching delivery techniques. Through a combination of theory, hands-on activities, and real-world examples, learners will gain the knowledge and skills required to become effective and impactful educators.

Teaching is a noble art that plays a pivotal role in shaping the minds of future generations. The journey of education begins with understanding the foundation of teaching and learning. Teachers must familiarize themselves with various teaching methods and pedagogies to create an enriching and stimulating learning environment for their students.

To start, let's explore the diverse range of teaching methods and pedagogies available. From traditional lectures and discussions to more interactive approaches like group work, project-based learning, and flipped classrooms, each method serves unique purposes and caters to different learning styles. Understanding these options allows teachers to tailor their lessons effectively.

Learning Objectives for Teaching Methods:

  1. Understand the various teaching methods and their characteristics, such as lecture-based, interactive, experiential, and online teaching approaches.

  2. Identify the strengths and weaknesses of different teaching methods in different educational contexts.

  3. Learn how to select appropriate teaching methods based on the learning objectives, content, and the needs of diverse learners.

  4. Apply effective teaching methods to engage students actively in the learning process and enhance their understanding of the subject matter.

  5. Demonstrate the ability to adapt and modify teaching methods based on student feedback and learning outcomes.

  6. Evaluate the impact of different teaching methods on student performance and motivation.

Learning Objectives for Teaching Quality:

  1. Define and recognize the key components of teaching quality, including content expertise, pedagogical knowledge, communication skills, and classroom management.

  2. Identify the characteristics of a positive and inclusive learning environment that promotes student engagement, respect, and academic growth.

  3. Assess and implement strategies to maintain high standards of teaching and continually improve instructional practices.

The inability to focus, be happy or feel relaxed has become epidemic in our country resulting in the devastating consequences of chronic disorders and dysfunction. The stress from widespread family instability, economic uncertainties, poor diets and the bombardment of information  over-stimulating our nervous systems, is causing widespread suffering. Biologically this occurs from ischemia and inflammation in the cardiovascular system known as Tension Myositis Syndrome. The parasympathetic and immune systems are shut down while the body produces increased levels of adrenaline, cortisol and blood sugar. The feel good and health promoting bio-chemicals such as serotonin, dopamine, oxytocin and gaba are disrupted. This combines to create anxiety, depression and attention disorders while predisposing individuals to stress related illnesses form heart disease, high blood pressure and diabetes. 

What if it was possible to begin to correct the underlying causes of these symptoms and access whatever biochemical substances are needed to feel good or focus by having one’s prescription filled from one’s inner pharmacy? Can you imagine how health care costs could dramatically decline and millions of lives be improved by integrating this one idea into our society? This is the vision and intent of this course

courseDetails.title: Print on Demand 2023: From Zero to Profitable Business
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Print-on-Demand: Learn Niche Research, Store Setup, Design, Marketing Strategies, and Launch E-Commerce Business
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to this comprehensive course on launching and managing a successful print-on-demand e-commerce store using Launch Cart and Printful.


In this course, we will guide you through the entire process of setting up your online store from scratch, starting from niche research and selection, creating a business name, registering a domain, designing a logo and landing pages, all the way through to managing your products and marketing your store.


Section 1: Overview

We will start with a brief overview of what's inside this course, followed by an in-depth explanation of how print-on-demand works and why Launch Cart is the best platform to use for your e-commerce store. You will learn about the expectations and profit potential of print-on-demand, and why it is a smart choice for anyone looking to start an online business.


Section 2: Getting Started

Next, we will dive into the initial steps of creating your store. We will cover niche research and selection, and guide you through the process of finding a business name that resonates with your brand. We will also provide you with tips on how to conduct domain name research and registration, and show you how to create an attractive logo and designs that capture the essence of your brand.


Section 3: Setting Up Store

Once you have your branding in place, we will show you how to set up your store using Launch Cart. We will guide you through the process of signing up and provide an overview of the Launch Cart dashboard. You will learn how to connect Printful with Launch Cart, set up Printful settings, and create custom pages, landing/sales pages, and store themes. You will also learn how to customize checkout pages and menus, connect a custom domain to your store, and set up shipping and taxes. We will also show you how to boost your conversion rates using abandoned carts and how to make admin customizations.


Section 4: Store Management

Now that your store is set up, we will show you how to manage it effectively. You will learn how to add new products, including adding products from Printful, managing sales and coupons, managing customers and reviews, managing inventory, and even managing multiple stores. We will also show you how to offer bumper offers and upsells to your customers to maximize your profits.


Section 5: Product Design

Product design is a critical aspect of your print-on-demand store, and in this section, we will guide you through the process of designing your products. We will show you how to purchase designs, use Canva for designing, and even design using AI.


Section 6: Paid Marketing Strategies

In this section, we will dive into the different paid marketing strategies that you can use to drive traffic and sales to your store. You will learn about paid ads, the best ad strategy, influencer marketing, and creating video ads and mockups.


Section 7: Free Traffic Sources

Free traffic sources can be just as effective as paid marketing, and we will show you how to take advantage of them. We will cover the use of coupons and sales, affiliate marketing, Pinterest, live streams, email marketing, list building, Quora and Reddit, and even Tiktok, Shorts, and Reels.



By the end of this course, you will have a fully functional, profitable print-on-demand eCommerce store, with the knowledge and skills to manage and market it effectively. Join us now and start your journey to success in the online business world!
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to start a print-on-demand business.
Entrepreneurs who want to expand their product offerings and revenue streams.
Those who want to learn how to use Launch Cart and Printful to create a successful print-on-demand business.
Individuals who want to design their own products and sell them online.
Small business owners who want to add print-on-demand products to their existing inventory.
Anyone interested in e-commerce and online business.
Those who want to learn about marketing strategies for print-on-demand products.
Beginners with no prior knowledge or experience in print-on-demand or e-commerce.

courseDetails.title: Food & Courier : Collection Job, Delivery Job & Feedback

courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Food & Courier: Collection Job, Delivery Job & Feedback

In the fast-paced world we live in, convenience is key. With the rise of online food delivery services, the food and courier industry has witnessed a significant transformation. Today, we will explore the different aspects of this industry, focusing on collection jobs, delivery jobs, and the importance of customer feedback.

The collection job plays a crucial role in the food and courier industry. It involves picking up orders from restaurants or food outlets and ensuring they are ready for delivery. Timeliness and efficiency are paramount in this role, as any delays can negatively impact the customer's experience.

Once the orders are collected, the delivery job takes center stage. Delivery personnel are responsible for transporting the orders from the restaurant or food outlet to the customer's location. This role requires individuals to be well-versed in navigation, as they must find the most efficient routes to ensure timely deliveries.

Customer feedback is invaluable in the food and courier industry. It provides valuable insights into the overall customer experience, allowing companies to identify areas for improvement.

The food and courier industry has revolutionized the way we enjoy our meals. Collection jobs and delivery jobs are the backbone of this industry, ensuring that orders reach customers promptly and efficiently. Furthermore, customer feedback plays a vital role in shaping and improving the services provided. As the industry continues to evolve, it is crucial for companies to adapt and embrace customer feedback to deliver the best possible experience.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 6 major topics:

1. Introduction to Food & Courier Services

2. Food and courier Collection Job & Delivery Job

3. Communication and Customer Interaction of collection and delivery job

4. Food Safety and Hygiene, Health and Wellness of collection and delivery job

5. Technology and Tools, Feedback and Quality Improvement of collection and delivery job

courseDetails.title: The Concept of  Waste
courseDetails.shortDescription: Reduce waste and streamline value flow
courseDetails.longDescription:
Companies are always looking for new ways to improve business efficiency and increase quality. To run a business at optimal capacity, you need to reduce or eliminate waste from processes and improve production flow. In this course, you'll learn about Lean strategies to reduce waste by determining which operations add value and which don't. You'll explore the concept of continuous flow, and discover how to balance work processes to make production flow more efficient. You'll define what waste is, where it exists, and what causes it. You'll also examine aspects of Muda, continuous flow, line balancing, value and non-value-add, and practical Lean techniques for improving Operations Management.

What is waste in Lean Manufacturing?

A core principle in lean methodology is the removal of waste within an operation. And in any business, one of the heaviest drains on profitability is waste. Lean waste can come in the form of time, material, and labor. But it may also be related to the utilization of skill-sets as well as poor planning. In lean manufacturing, waste is any expense or effort that is expended but which does not transform raw materials into an item the customer is willing to pay for. By optimizing process steps and eliminating waste, the only true value is added at each phase of production.

Today, the Lean Manufacturing model recognizes 8 types of waste within an operation; seven originally conceived when the Toyota Production System was first conceived, and an eighth added when the lean methodology was adopted within the Western World. Seven of the eight wastes are production process-oriented, while the eighth waste is directly related to management’s ability to utilize personnel.

WHAT YOU WILL LEARN to

  1. classify production activities as a value-add, non-value-add, or necessary non-value-add.

  2. identify strategies for eliminating waste caused by overproduction and inventory.

  3. identify strategies for eliminating motion, waiting, and transportation waste.

  4. identify elimination strategies for waste caused by overprocessing and defects

  5. match cycle time and takt time to their descriptions

  6. identify the final three steps for balancing a production line
targetAudiences: Any professional, who is seeking career growth in the quality management sector

Managers, Supervisors, Team Leaders, CEO, and Senior Managers, who want to encourage continuous improvement for an organisation and responsible for developing lean thinking, practical skills, measurement of production staff, and analysing the performance of the employee in the workplace.
Individuals involved in a continuous improvement project who needs a complete overview of the process

                                                              Whether you are a scrum master, product owner, team member, business stakeholder or simply someone who wants to understand what makes scrum tick, this is the place to start.  If you are preparing for a scrum master certification or other scrum certification, this class is for you. 

  What will I learn? 

                                                              In this class you will learn: 

  • Concise overview of Scrum - The exact events, roles, rules and artefacts used to deliver a project using scrum along with the history of Scrum.  This includes lectures on the fundamentals of Sprint Planning, The Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective, Scrum Artefacts and more.

  • The facts based on the Scrum Guide - The correct terminology and use of Scrum is essential to mastering it. The Scrum Guide is the rule book on Scrum and many do not use it or know it.

  • Scrum Certification Preparation - A summary of frequently asked questions (FAQs) and frequently misunderstood points around Scrum that have been in past Open Assessment exams.

  • Scrum Certification - I then tell you how to prepare for Scrum Certification and how to sit it online saving you hundreds if not thousands of dollars.

                                                              The course is video based with no supporting document necessary.  I go through key gotchas from the scrum guide. 


The perfect recap for experts and scrum for beginners + Scrum Master Certification Preparation

Learn Scrum & prepare for your Scrum Master or Agile certification based on the Scrum Guide™ v2020  ( 2020 scrum guide  ) .

  How is the course structured? 

                                                              Each section features an overview of a particular aspect of Scrum such as Scrum Roles, Events, or Artefacts, followed by a summary of key exam points and frequent misunderstandings in industry.  All is based on the scrum guide so you know that you are learning the facts. 

Perfect if you are interested in Scrum Master Certification, Scrum Master Jobs, increasing your Scrum Master Salary, gaining a Scrum Master Role, furthering your Scrum Master Training or meeting a Scrum Master job description.

Inspired by God, the Bible, Ken Schwaber, Jeff Sutherland

courseDetails.title: Revit- Mass Modeling- From Zero to Complex Shapes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Conceptual Mass- Complex Forms with Massing in Revit and Parametric Design- Facades, Towers and Various Surfaces
courseDetails.longDescription:
Note: The main difference in this course compared to others is that we have not confined ourselves to explaining simple techniques. Instead, we have conveyed the subject through challenging projects and specific tricks, which are the result of numerous experiences.


  • Do you think Revit cannot model any form?

  • Have you encountered patterns and shapes in your projects but didn't know how to model them in Revit?

  • Are you interested in organic and free-form designs and frequently use them in your designs?

In this course, we first explain the principles of modeling in Revit and its differences from the project environment. We quickly move on to creating form-based surfaces and learn the basic concepts of modeling in Revit through several examples. Then, we delve into complex forms, and I can say that together we will create any form that you thought might be impossible to model in Revit and practice it.

Next, we will explore the fascinating topic of parametric modeling. We will model various diverse projects and share numerous tricks with you. To make this course shine, I have also provided examples of openable, closable, and animated forms for you to enjoy.


Some of the topics covered in this course include:

  • Explanation of MASS and its applications

  • Modeling techniques in MASS

  • Explanation of options, such as 3D Snapping

  • Difference between Ref Line and Model Line

  • Explanation of Mass in Place

  • Explanation of Mass Study (also known as Mass Overlay)

  • Importing complex volumes from 3DS Max and Rhino

  • Explanation of various patterns and their modeling techniques

  • Parameterizing patterns and Surfaces

  • Modeling openable, closable, and animated structures

If you are currently a BIM modeler or planning to become one, it is essential not to limit yourself to any form. You should be able to manage any architectural design in the BIM process And in the end, you will be the hero of this training. Please watch this course and feel free to ask me any questions you have while watching it. Additionally, during the learning BIM Process, ask me questions so that I can guide you.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Blockchain Professional Certification by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Blockchain Expert Certification (BCEC) Assessment

This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

! Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:

  1. Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test

  2. Write us with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma


Assessment Description:

The Blockchain Expert Certification holds immense significance for both employees and companies alike, as blockchain continues to revolutionize industries across the globe.


Importance for Employees:

Specialized Knowledge: Obtaining a Blockchain Expert Certification demonstrates a high level of competence and understanding of blockchain technology. It equips employees with specialized knowledge that sets them apart from their peers and opens up new career opportunities.


Career Advancement: With the growing adoption of blockchain technology, certified professionals are in high demand across various industries. Blockchain certification enhances employability and provides employees with a competitive edge, facilitating career advancement and potential salary growth.


Industry Recognition: A Blockchain Expert Certification is a recognized validation of an individual's expertise in blockchain technology. It establishes credibility and demonstrates a commitment to professional growth, garnering respect within the industry.


Versatile Skill Set: Blockchain expertise encompasses various areas such as cryptography, decentralized applications, smart contracts, and consensus mechanisms. This diverse skill set allows professionals to explore roles in blockchain development, project management, consulting, and research, providing versatility in career options.


Future-Proofing Careers: Blockchain technology is poised to disrupt numerous industries, including finance, supply chain, healthcare, and more. By gaining blockchain expertise, employees future-proof their careers, ensuring relevance and adaptability in the evolving job market.


Importance for Companies:

Innovation and Competitiveness: Companies that embrace blockchain technology gain a competitive advantage by harnessing its transformative potential. Hiring certified blockchain experts enables organizations to innovate, explore new business models, and develop blockchain-based solutions that enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.


Effective Implementation: Blockchain implementations require specialized knowledge to navigate the complexities and challenges associated with decentralized systems. Certified professionals possess the necessary skills to lead and manage blockchain initiatives, ensuring successful and effective implementation within the organization.


Risk Mitigation: Blockchain technology offers enhanced security, transparency, and immutability, mitigating risks such as fraud, data tampering, and identity theft. By hiring certified blockchain experts, companies can leverage this technology to safeguard their digital assets and protect against potential threats.


Industry Partnerships and Collaboration: Many blockchain initiatives involve collaboration among multiple organizations. Having certified experts facilitates partnerships and collaborations, as companies with certified professionals gain credibility and trust among potential collaborators.


Talent Attraction and Retention: The demand for blockchain professionals exceeds the current supply, making it a highly competitive job market. Companies offering blockchain certifications to their employees demonstrate a commitment to fostering talent development, attracting top talent, and retaining skilled professionals within the organization.


Building a Career in Blockchain:

Building a career in blockchain provides numerous opportunities for growth and impact. With the increasing adoption of blockchain across industries, professionals with blockchain expertise are sought after for roles such as blockchain developers, solution architects, consultants, project managers, and researchers.


Additionally, blockchain professionals can contribute to the development of decentralized applications, explore entrepreneurship opportunities through blockchain startups, or work in regulatory and policy-making bodies shaping the future of blockchain technology.


Continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in blockchain technology is crucial for career growth. Pursuing advanced certifications, attending industry conferences, and actively engaging in blockchain communities helps professionals stay at the forefront of this rapidly evolving field.


The Blockchain Expert Certification holds immense importance for both employees and companies. For employees, it provides specialized knowledge, enhances career prospects, and establishes industry recognition. For companies, it enables innovation, effective implementation, risk mitigation, and talent attraction.


By investing in blockchain certifications, individuals and organizations can unlock the transformative potential of blockchain technology, contributing to their personal and professional growth, as well as the overall advancement of the industry.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn and understand how to work with SQL and NoSQL Databases with the Python Programming Language.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hello and welcome to the Databases with Python: MySQL, SQLite & MongoDB with Python Course.

Using and manipulating databases is one of the most important and powerful skills that every developer should master well, because it is in great demand in the market constantly and with high salaries.

So, if you want to be a professional developer, engineer or data scientist, it is very important to be familiar with dealing with databases of all kinds.

In this course, you will learn how to use different types of databases with the Python programming language, from beginning to professionalism. You will master the use of SQL through MySQL and SQLite, and Also NoSQL through MongoDB.


You'll learn:

  • Build and Manipulate Databases with Python

  • Master SQL programming

  • Installing and using the MySQL tools

  • Using MySQL with Python

  • Create, insert, update, filter and delete records, tables and databases in SQL

  • Apply the SQL Commands in Python without installing programs

  • Using SQLite with Python

  • Master NoSQL programming

  • Installing and using the MongoDB tools

  • Practicing MongoDB with Python

  • Create, insert, update, filter and delete documents and collections in NoSQL

  • Get the instructor QA support

  • and more.

A database is a structured collection of data. It may be anything from a simple shopping list to a picture gallery or a place to hold the vast amounts of information in a corporate network.

What is MySQL?

MySQL is a relational database management system (RDBMS) developed by Oracle that is based on structured query language (SQL).

MySQL is open source, flexible, high performance, secure, and easy to use.

What is SQLite?

SQLite is a software library that provides a relational database management system. The lite in SQLite means lightweight in terms of setup, database administration, and required resources.

SQLite has the following noticeable features: self-contained, serverless, zero-configuration, transactional.

What is MongoDB?

MongoDB is an open-source NoSQL database management program used for large sets of distributed data.

Organizations can use Mongo DB for its ad-hoc queries, indexing, load balancing, aggregation, server-side execution and other features.


Hi, my name is Ahmed Ibrahim. I’m a software engineer and Data Science Professional, and I’ll be the instructor for this course.

If you have any questions during this course, please don’t hesitate to ask me questions, and I’ll answer you as soon as possible.

Assessment Description:

The Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification is specifically tailored for individuals aspiring to or currently holding leadership positions in digital transformation and strategy.


Importance for Employees:

Obtaining a Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification can significantly benefit employees in various ways. Firstly, it provides individuals with a solid foundation in digital transformation and digital business strategies. This knowledge is increasingly essential in today's technology-driven world, where businesses must adapt to stay competitive. By acquiring this certification, employees demonstrate their expertise in leading digital initiatives, enabling them to become valuable assets within their organizations.


Secondly, the CDO Certification enhances career prospects by opening up new opportunities in the digital field. Companies across industries are actively seeking professionals who can drive digital innovation and transformation. With this certification, employees can showcase their proficiency in developing and implementing digital strategies, which gives them a competitive edge in the job market.


Furthermore, the CDO Certification helps employees develop a comprehensive skill set necessary for successful digital leadership. It covers a wide range of topics, including digital marketing, data analytics, cybersecurity, user experience, and emerging technologies. This diverse knowledge equips individuals with the ability to navigate complex digital landscapes, make data-driven decisions, and drive organizational growth.


Importance for Companies:

For companies, having employees certified as Chief Digital Officers brings numerous advantages. Firstly, certified CDOs possess the expertise needed to drive digital transformation initiatives. They understand the intricacies of digital technologies, consumer behavior, and industry trends, enabling them to develop effective strategies that align with business goals. With a certified CDO at the helm, companies can accelerate their digital transformation efforts and stay ahead of the competition.


Secondly, certified CDOs are equipped to optimize customer experiences and engagement. They possess a deep understanding of digital marketing techniques, user experience design, and data analytics. This expertise allows them to leverage customer insights and implement personalized strategies that enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention.


Moreover, CDO Certification ensures that companies have leaders who can effectively manage digital risks and cybersecurity threats. With the increasing reliance on digital platforms and data, organizations must prioritize data privacy, protection, and compliance. Certified CDOs are well-versed in implementing robust cybersecurity measures and establishing data governance frameworks, mitigating risks and safeguarding sensitive information.


Digital Transformation and Digital Business:

Digital Transformation and Digital Business topics covered in the CDO Certification are highly valuable for building a career. In today's digital era, businesses are continuously evolving to leverage technology for innovation, efficiency, and growth. Professionals who possess expertise in digital transformation and digital business strategies are in high demand across industries.


Understanding the fundamentals of digital transformation enables individuals to identify opportunities for disruption, create agile and customer-centric strategies, and drive organizational change. Digital business topics equip professionals with the knowledge to leverage emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence, blockchain, and the Internet of Things, to develop innovative business models, improve operational efficiency, and create new revenue streams.


Professionals with expertise in digital transformation and digital business are well-positioned for leadership roles in various industries, including finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. They have the skills to navigate the evolving digital landscape, embrace emerging technologies, and lead organizations through successful digital transformations.


The Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification plays a crucial role in equipping professionals with the necessary knowledge, skills, and credentials to excel in the digital world. It provides employees with a competitive advantage, enhances career prospects, and enables them to become valuable assets to their organizations. For companies, having certified CDOs empowers them to drive digital transformation, optimize customer experiences, and manage digital risks effectively. Moreover, the digital transformation and digital business topics covered in the certification are instrumental in building a successful career in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.

What is NumPy?

NumPy, short for Numerical Python, is a powerful library in Python for numerical computations. It provides support for large, multi-dimensional arrays and matrices, along with a vast collection of mathematical functions to manipulate and analyze data efficiently.

How do I install NumPy?

To install NumPy, you can use package managers like pip or conda. Open your command prompt or terminal and run the following command: pip install numpy or conda install numpy. This will download and install the NumPy library on your system.

How do I create a NumPy array?

NumPy arrays can be created using the numpy.array() function by passing a Python list or tuple as an argument. For example: import numpy as np my_array = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) creates a NumPy array containing the elements 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.

How do I access elements in a NumPy array?

You can access elements in a NumPy array by specifying the index of the desired element. For example: import numpy as np my_array = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) print(my_array[0]) will output the first element of the array, which is 1.

What is the difference between a shallow copy and a deep copy in NumPy?

In NumPy, a shallow copy creates a new array object that references the original data. Any changes made to the shallow copy will reflect in the original array. On the other hand, a deep copy creates a completely independent copy of the array and its data. Modifying the deep copy does not affect the original array. Shallow copies can be created using the view() method, while deep copies can be created using the copy() method.

How do I perform mathematical operations on NumPy arrays?

NumPy provides a wide range of mathematical functions that can be applied to arrays. You can perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division on arrays directly, or you can use NumPy's built-in functions such as numpy.add(), numpy.subtract(), numpy.multiply(), and numpy.divide().

Can I reshape a NumPy array?

Yes, you can reshape a NumPy array using the numpy.reshape() function. It allows you to change the dimensions of an array without changing its data. For example: import numpy as np my_array = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]) reshaped_array = np.reshape(my_array, (2, 3)) reshapes the original array into a 2x3 matrix.

How do I perform element-wise operations on NumPy arrays?

NumPy universal functions (ufuncs) enable you to perform element-wise operations on arrays. Ufuncs apply the specified operation to each element of the array, allowing for efficient computations. Examples of ufuncs include numpy.add(), numpy.subtract(), numpy.multiply(), and numpy.divide().

Can I sort a NumPy array?

Yes, you can sort a NumPy array using the numpy.sort() function. By default, it sorts the array in ascending order. You can also specify the axis parameter to sort along a specific axis if you have a multi-dimensional array.

How can I generate random numbers with NumPy?

NumPy provides a random module that allows you to generate random numbers and arrays. You can use functions like numpy.random.rand(), numpy.random.randint(), and numpy.random.normal() to generate random numbers from different distributions.

courseDetails.title: The Dynamic Economic Dispatch for Electricity Grids
courseDetails.shortDescription: The dynamic dispatch analytical algorithm
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dynamic economic dispatch (DED) is an optimization problem that determines the optimal power generation schedule for a power system over a finite time horizon. The goal of DED is to minimize the total cost of generation while meeting the load demand and satisfying all operational constraints.

DED is a more complex problem than static economic dispatch (SED), which only considers the cost of generation at a single point in time. DED must take into account the dynamic behavior of the power system, such as the startup and shutdown costs of generators, the time it takes to ramp up or down generator output, and the effects of load variations.

There are a number of different approaches to solving the DED problem. Some common methods include:

  • Dynamic programming: This is a recursive method that solves the DED problem by breaking it down into a series of smaller subproblems.

  • Mixed-integer linear programming: This is a mathematical programming technique that can be used to solve a wide variety of optimization problems, including DED.

  • Heuristics: These are problem-specific algorithms that can be used to find good, but not necessarily optimal, solutions to the DED problem.

DED is an important tool for power system operators to ensure that the power system is operated in a cost-effective and reliable manner. As the power system becomes more complex, with the increasing penetration of renewable energy sources and the need to integrate distributed energy resources, the importance of DED will only grow.

Here are some of the benefits of using dynamic economic dispatch:

  • It can help to reduce the cost of generation.

  • It can improve the reliability of the power system.

  • It can help to meet environmental regulations.

  • It can facilitate the integration of renewable energy sources.

This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Workplace First Aid 101: In this section, you will explore the fundamentals of first aid training in the workplace including necessary first aid arrangements, regulations, need assessment and role of the appointed persons.

  2. First Things First: Workplace injuries can be critical. You need to know how to do the primary assessment of a victim who’s injured or has fallen ill to determine the type and severity of their condition and plan the next steps. It will be covered in this section.

  3. Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR): Emergency response procedures such as CPR can be lifesaving. CPR, the recovery position, rolling a victim into the recovery position, performing CPR, delivering effective chest compressions, rescuing breaths, and determining when to stop CPR are covered here.

  4. Automated External Defibrillator (AED): In first aid training, it is crucial to understand how to use an AED. Basically, AEDs are lifesaving devices that can be used during sudden cardiac arrest. This section will talk about what they are, and how they can be used safely.

Are you ready to unlock the world of business consulting and become a trusted advisor to organizations seeking growth, efficiency, and innovation? Welcome to "Mastering Business Consulting: Strategies, Skills, and Ethics for Success."

Business consulting is a professional service that involves providing expert advice, guidance, and solutions to businesses and organizations to help them address specific challenges, achieve goals, and improve overall performance. Business consultants, often referred to as management consultants, leverage their expertise, experience, and analytical skills to offer strategic insights and practical recommendations to clients.

In this comprehensive course, you'll delve into the intricacies of the consulting landscape, equipping yourself with the knowledge, tools, and ethical principles essential for a successful consulting career. Through a structured series of lectures, you'll embark on a journey that covers everything from understanding the consulting process and strategic planning to financial analysis, marketing, and organizational development.

Discover how to identify client needs and expectations, conduct in-depth business analyses, and interpret data to extract valuable insights. Learn the art of problem-solving through techniques like SWOT analysis, and craft effective business strategies that yield measurable results. Dive into optimizing business processes, mastering financial analysis, refining marketing and sales strategies, and managing change within organizations.

Enhance your communication and presentation skills, gaining the ability to communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders, even in challenging situations. Navigate the world of ethics and professionalism in consulting, understanding the importance of integrity, confidentiality, and maintaining trust.

Business consultants typically work with clients on a project basis, delivering tailored solutions that address specific challenges or opportunities. Their recommendations are based on thorough analysis, industry expertise, and a deep understanding of the client's unique circumstances. Consultants may also provide ongoing support and guidance to ensure successful implementation of recommended strategies.

Overall, business consulting plays a crucial role in helping organizations navigate complex business environments, make informed decisions, and achieve sustainable growth and success.

Whether you're an aspiring consultant or seeking to elevate your existing consulting career, this course offers a comprehensive toolkit to thrive in the dynamic field of business consulting. "Mastering Business Consulting" empowers you with the expertise needed to guide organizations towards success while upholding the highest ethical standards.

Embark on your journey to becoming a trusted business consultant today.

Thank you.

You will also learn how to take advantage of HTML5's advanced features, such as multimedia elements. Throughout the course, you will also learn about best practices for web development.

I have divided this course in many sections

  7. Block Level & Inline Level Tags

  8. Table

  9. Media

  10. Forms

  14. Conclusion

By the end of the course, you will have developed the skills to create professional-quality websites that are optimized for performance, accessibility, and user experience. If you are beginner or want to pursue your career as a web developer, this course will equip you with the tools and knowledge you need to create modern and engaging web experiences.

courseDetails.title: دورة مختصرة عن العملات الرقمية المشفرة
courseDetails.shortDescription: أقصر دورة في هذه المنصة تتحدث عن موضوع العملات الرقمية المشفرة
courseDetails.longDescription:
هذه الدورة مقدمة من مؤسسة د.سام للخدمات الاستشارية والتعليمية التابعة لمجموعة البسام. وهي من إعداد أ.بسام موسى. وهذه الدورة هي عصارة جهود وخبرات لمدة ساعات وايام وليالي طويلة في عام ٢٠٢١م

هذه أقصر دورة في هذه المنصة تتحدث عن موضوع العملات الرقمية المشفرة فهي دورة مختصرة أتحدث فيها عن تجربتي المتواضعة في هذا السوق واشارك تجربتي معكم. انصحكم بمتابعة هذه الدورة قبل أن تبدأوا في شراء العملات لانها ستساعدكم على اتخاذ القرار إما بدخول هذا السوق أو تركه. في هذه الدورة اعطيكم نبذة مختصرة عن العملات الرقمية المشفرة ومشاريعها، وطرق الحصول عليها كما اشرح المفاهيم الاساسية مثل المنصة والمحفظة و اوضح لكم اسباب عدم اسقرار السوق بالإضافة إلى مواضيع مهمة ذات علاقة.

نبذة عن المدرب: أ.بسام متخصص لغات، مدرس، مترجم، مدرب، مستشار في المجال التربوي والتعليمي ومصمم مناهج تعليمية.  لديه شهادة بكلاريوس في التربية والآداب بقسم اللغة الإنجليزية بالإضافة إلى شهادة دبلوم في الإنجليزية التجارية. عمل في معاهد ومراكز تدريبية محلية وعالمية متعددة وساهم في تطويرها وكان يعد أحد أعمدتها مثل مركز نوران، المعهد الكندي، المعهد الفرنسي الأمريكي، معهد نيوهورايزن، الجامعة اللبنانية ومركز ابديت للتدريب والاستشارات. قام بتدريب أكثر من 9,000 شخص في مجالات مختلفة بما فيها مجال اللغة الإنجليزية وقام بتأهيل أكثر من 35 مدرس في اللغة الإنجليزية. كما قام بتصميم منهج متخصص للمعهد الوطني للعلوم الإدارية في محافظة عدن.

كما عمل ايضاً في منظمات دولية غير حكومية مثل :منظمة الهجرة الدولية التابعة للأمم المتحدة (IOM)، المجلس الدنماركي لمساندة اللاجئين(DRC) ، هيئة الأعمال الخيرية(Human Appeal International) ، ومنظمة ميرسي كور الأمريكية (Mercy Corps) . شغل مناصب مختلفة ومن ضمنها مديراً لبرامج كبرى في تلك المنظمات.

يقوم حالياً بعمل دورات تدريبية وذلك بالتنسيق مع جهات ومؤسسات متعددة كما يقوم بعمل دورات عبر منصات تعليمية مشهورة عالمياً بالإضافة إلى الإشراف على آلية عمل مجموعة البسام.
targetAudiences: من يريد الحصول على معلومات حول العملات الرقمية المشفرة في وقت قصير جداً
من ليس لديه أي فكرة حول العملات الرقمية المشفرة
الأشخاص الذين يريدون دخول سوق العملات الرقمية المشفرة ولا يعرفون الكيفية
المحتارون في قرار دخول سوق العملات الرقمية المشفرة
